Text:
Anybody got Makavejevs "Manifesto"?
Don't think I ever saw this movie, loading though to see it now, DM is/was a very interesting director.
this fuckin thing is taking foorrreeeever to download.. but thank you. and ill seed it for a bit

This work of the best Czeck and world class Director Dusan Makavejev is a gem of a movie. A black comedy of the 1st order. From the wonderfull opening sequence to the final curtain a textbook in movie storytelling and the directors art.
Thanks for the up.
